text: My job is talking to you.
...Honestly? Eraton is wonderful. I always had trouble saying no to people, even before my parents gave me away. --n When I learned what was expected of me as faithful, I...
But it hasn't been like I feared. Not at all. Eraton, it's like he has a sixth sense for how I feel. I've never had to say no to him because he just... well, knows.
You've never noticed? The way Eraton can sometimes tell what you're thinking or feeling?
I'd read the stories of Queen Felt, but just thought that's all they were, stories. It makes me wonder what other kinds of abilities His Majesty is hiding.
...That didn't sound dirty, did it? I'm sorry if it did! I don't-- well, I mean I do... sometimes... uh um I-I-I-I-- So, anything *interesting* happen today?
There was an accident outside? Someone was burned alive? Oh. Oh, gods. --n Y-you're going to help them, right, Forel? I-I know it's too late, but, you can at least find out what happened, can't you?
Oh, Forel, you're wonderful! If you need any help, anything at all, just tell me. --n I mean... I'm only really good with *book*s, but...
